name: Saturday Night Fever
tagline: A Brooklyn youth feels his only chance to get somewhere is as the king of the disco floor.

name: The Color Purple
tagline: The life and trials of a young African American woman.

name: Julie & Julia
tagline: Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book.

name: He's Just Not That Into You
tagline: The Baltimore-set movie of interconnecting story arcs deals with the challenges of reading or misreading human behavior.

name: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
tagline: During the Napoleonic Wars, a brash British captain pushes his ship and crew to their limits in pursuit of a formidable French war vessel around South America.

name: Maid in Manhattan
tagline: A senatorial candidate falls for a hotel maid, thinking she is a socialite when he sees her trying on a wealthy woman's dress.

name: The Mask of Zorro
tagline: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who is also seeking a vengeance of his own.

name: Flight
tagline: An airline pilot saves almost all his passengers on his malfunctioning airliner which eventually crashed, but an investigation into the accident reveals something troubling.

name: America's Sweethearts
tagline: A movie publicist deals with the messy public split of his movie's co-stars while keeping reporters at bay while a reclusive director holds the film's print hostage.

name: Lady and the Tramp
tagline: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

name: The Fighter
tagline: A look at the early years of boxer "Irish" Micky Ward and his brother who helped train him before going pro in the mid 1980s.

name: The Bucket List
tagline: Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.

name: Cats & Dogs
tagline: A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, which their human owners are blissfully unaware of.

name: Two Weeks Notice
tagline: A lawyer decides that she's used too much like a nanny by her boss, so she walks out on him.

name: The Poseidon Adventure
tagline: A group of passengers struggle to survive and escape, when their ocean liner completely capsizes at sea.

name: Elysium
tagline: In the year 2154, the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth. A man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.

name: Flubber
tagline: An absent-minded professor discovers "flubber," a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

name: Red Dragon
tagline: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer; aiding him is imprisoned criminal genius Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

name: When Harry Met Sally...
tagline: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

name: The Town
tagline: As he plans his next job, a longtime thief tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to one of his earlier heists, as well as the FBI agent looking to bring him and his crew down.

name: The Client
tagline: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the district attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

name: Star Trek: First Contact
tagline: Captain Picard and his crew pursue the Borg back in time to stop them from preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. They also make sure that Zefram Cochrane makes his famous maiden flight at warp speed.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
tagline: Peter Parker runs the gauntlet as the mysterious company Oscorp sends up a slew of supervillains against him, impacting on his life.

name: Think Like a Man
tagline: Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.

name: Kindergarten Cop
tagline: A tough cop is given his most difficult assignment ever: to masquerade as a kindergarten teacher in order to find a drug dealer.

name: Crimson Tide
tagline: On a US nuclear missile sub, a young first officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

name: Back to School
tagline: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.

name: The Haunting
tagline: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

name: Save the Last Dance
tagline: A white midwestern girl moves to Chicago, where her new boyfriend is a black teen from the South Side with a rough, semi-criminal past.

name: Stepmom
tagline: A terminally-ill mother has to settle on the new woman in her ex-husband's life, who will be their new stepmother.

name: The Karate Kid
tagline: A handyman/martial arts master agrees to teach a bullied boy karate and shows him that there is more to the martial art than fighting.

name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
tagline: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

name: Non-Stop
tagline: An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages that put his fellow passengers at risk unless the airline transfers $150 million into an off-shore account.

name: Scary Movie 4
tagline: Cindy finds out the house she lives in is haunted by a little boy and goes on a quest to find out who killed him and why. Also, Alien "Tr-iPods" are invading the world and she has to uncover the secret in order to stop them.

name: Antz
tagline: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

name: The Game Plan
tagline: An NFL quarterback living the bachelor lifestyle discovers that he has a 8-year-old daughter from a previous relationship.

name: Me, Myself & Irene
tagline: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

name: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
tagline: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

name: Madea Goes to Jail
tagline: Mischievous grandma Madea lands in jail, where she meets a variety of mixed-up characters.

name: Space Cowboys
tagline: When a retired engineer is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

name: Space Jam
tagline: Michael Jordan agrees to help the Looney Toons play a basketball game vs. alien slavers to determine their freedom.

name: Trading Places
tagline: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

name: RED
tagline: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.

name: The Scorpion King
tagline: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.

name: Planes
tagline: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.

name: Mystic River
tagline: With a childhood tragedy that overshadowed their lives, three men are reunited by circumstance when one loses a daughter.

name: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
tagline: Elle Woods heads to Washington D.C. to join the staff of a congresswoman in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.

name: Flightplan
tagline: A claustrophobic, Hitchcockian thriller. A bereaved woman and her daughter are flying home from Berlin to America. At 30,000 feet the child vanishes and nobody admits she was ever on that plane.

name: The Emperor's New Groove
tagline: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

name: The Lone Ranger
tagline: Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.

name: Scream 3
tagline: Ghostface pays Sidney and her friends a third visit while they visit the set of "Stab 3", the third movie based upon the Woodsboro murders.

name: Oblivion
tagline: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
tagline: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

name: Failure to Launch
tagline: A thirtysomething slacker suspects his parents of setting him up with his dream girl so he'll finally vacate their home.

name: The Muppets
tagline: With the help of three fans, The Muppets must reunite to save their old theater from a greedy oil tycoon.

name: Inside Man
tagline: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

name: Waterworld
tagline: In a future where the polar ice caps have melted and most of Earth is underwater, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

name: Starsky & Hutch
tagline: Two streetwise cops bust criminals in their red-and-white Ford Torino with the help of police snitch called Huggy Bear.

name: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
tagline: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

name: Along Came Polly
tagline: A buttoned up newlywed finds his too organized life falling into chaos when he falls in love with an old classmate.

name: Entrapment
tagline: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.

name: Back to the Future Part III
tagline: Enjoying a peaceable existence in 1885, Doctor Emmet Brown is about to be killed by Buford "Mad Dog" Tannen. Marty McFly travels back in time to save his friend.

name: Peter Pan
tagline: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

name: Pineapple Express
tagline: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witness his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

name: Out of Africa
tagline: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

name: Saw II
tagline: Jigsaw locks a few unlucky people in a booby trapped shelter and they must find a way out before they inhale too much of a lethal nerve gas and die. But they must watch out, for the traps Jigsaw has set in the shelter lead to death also.

name: The Naked Gun 2½: The Smell of Fear
tagline: Lieutenant Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

name: The Campaign
tagline: In order to gain influence over their North Carolina district, two CEOs seize an opportunity to oust long-term congressman Cam Brady by putting up a rival candidate. Their man: naive Marty Huggins, director of the local Tourism Center.

name: The Amityville Horror
tagline: Newlyweds move into a house where a murder was committed, and experience strange manifestations which drive them away.

name: Presumed Innocent
tagline: When the woman deputy prosecutor R.K. Sabich had an affair with is murdered the prosecutor asks him to lead the investigation. When Sabich digs too deeply he finds himself framed for the murder.

name: Young Frankenstein
tagline: Dr. Frankenstein's grandson, after years of living down the family reputation, inherits granddad's castle and repeats the experiments.

name: Mean Girls
tagline: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

name: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
tagline: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

name: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
tagline: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.

name: Real Steel
tagline: Set in the near future, where robot boxing is a top sport, a struggling promoter feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot. During his hopeful rise to the top, he discovers he has an 11-year-old son who wants to know his father.

name: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
tagline: SpongeBob SquarePants takes leave from the town of Bikini Bottom in order to track down King Neptune's stolen crown.

name: Brother Bear
tagline: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

name: Stripes
tagline: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

name: The Expendables 2
tagline: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

name: Dangerous Minds
tagline: An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.

name: Paranormal Activity 2
tagline: After experiencing what they think are a series of "break-ins", a family sets up security cameras around their home, only to realize that the events unfolding before them are more sinister than they seem.

name: The Santa Clause 3: The Escape Clause
tagline: Santa, aka Scott Calvin, is faced with double-duty: how to keep his new family happy, and how to stop Jack Frost from taking over Christmas.

name: Open Season
tagline: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.

name: Pinocchio
tagline: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

name: Crazy, Stupid, Love.
tagline: A middle-aged husband's life changes dramatically when his wife asks him for a divorce. He seeks to rediscover his manhood with the help of a newfound friend, Jacob, learning to pick up girls at bars.

name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
tagline: Mystery Inc. must save Coolsville from an attack of past unmasked monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to "unmask" the gang.

name: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy
tagline: Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 70's, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.

name: Cliffhanger
tagline: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

name: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
tagline: A young adventurer named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

name: The X Files
tagline: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.

name: Up in the Air
tagline: With a job traveling around the country firing people, Ryan Bingham enjoys his life living out of a suitcase, but finds that lifestyle threatened by the presence of a new hire and a potential love interest.

name: The War of the Roses
tagline: A married couple try everything to get each other to leave the house in a vicious divorce battle.

name: Wrath of the Titans
tagline: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.

name: Insidious: Chapter 2
tagline: The haunted Lambert family seeks to uncover the mysterious childhood secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world.

name: Battle Los Angeles
tagline: A squadron of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.
